label: Label
loadPeaksPrompt: Enter max distance in meters less than 20000.
helpText: • Place Observer - clicking the map set the position of the toposcope location
• Load peaks - clickig the map set the position around which sould be peaks from OpenStreetMap database downloaded
• Add POI - clicking the map will add new point to that location
• Move - enables dragging the points in the map
• Delete - clicking the point will remove it
• Ulož obrázok - ponukne stiahnúť obrázok výhľadovej ružice do SVG súboru
